policy_makers.name: Ocean Policy Institute
policy_makers.target_audience: Government Officials, Policy Makers, Environmental Agencies
policy_makers.call_to_action: implement stronger marine protection policies and increase funding

industry_leaders.name: Sustainable Marine Industries Coalition
industry_leaders.target_audience: Corporate Leaders, Manufacturing, Shipping, Energy Companies
industry_leaders.call_to_action: adopt sustainable practices and invest in clean marine technologies

communities.name: Coastal Communities Alliance
communities.target_audience: Local Communities, Volunteers, Community Leaders, Residents
communities.call_to_action: join local conservation efforts and engage in community marine protection
